formatted_address: No6, Jalan Nadi 5 , Taman Bukit Senadi, 79100 Johor Bahru , Johor Iskandar Puteri, 79100 Johor Bahru, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Rumah Makan Mak Pia

reviews.text: Great dining choice of you're looking for freshly grilled fish. We had grilled pomfret and stingray and it was an absolute treat! Will visit again.

Freshly grilled fish (ikan bakar), rice, ulam (vegetables), mee soto and multiple drinks later. Came here twice and will constantly return and recommend! Love how authentic the dishes were and fresh the fishes tasted.

Keep up the amazing cooking, grilling, cleanliness and service! üíØüíØ

Place is airy and clean so you don‚Äôt feel stuffy & uncomfortable. Plenty of free parking spaces. Highly recommended (esp if you‚Äôre around the area!)
Their nasi goreng kampung was ‚≠êÔ∏è. Simple meal but satisfyingly delicious. Highly recommended to those around the area to try out their other menus as well.
Great services from the staff. I ordered siakap bakar, laksa johor, soto, and all are tiptop! Repeat? Definitely yes üëèüèº
The best Laksa Johor so far in JB. Highly recommend the shop üëçüèº clean, friendly staff,  and affordable. Delicious puding caramel too!
